09-26-2024: - Bots can now choose to play Lady Geist, Mirage, Shiv, and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Warden|Size=20} Warden
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Life Drain|Size=20} Life Drain cooldown reduced from 42s to 30s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Malice|Size=20} Malice T1 improved from -2.75s Cooldown to -3s
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Life Drain|Size=20} Life Drain not healing extra based on amplifications (like Soul Shredder and Malice stacks)
09-12-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Essence Bomb|Size=20} Essence Bomb T3 damage increased from 22% to 26%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Essence Bomb|Size=20} Essence Bomb spirit scaling increased from 1.05 to 1.15

- Fixed a recent bug with {AbilityIcon|Ability=Malice|Size=20} Malice that caused multiple blood shards to be absorbed by 1 hero rather than pass through and hit others (it didn't stack that way in any case)
- Self Damage no longer consumes shields (general change)
08-16-2024: - Fixed Lady Geist not being able to jump during {AbilityIcon|Ability=Life Drain|Size=20} Life Drain
08-15-2024: - Improved effects around Lady Geist {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Exchange|Size=20} Soul Exchange to help with clarity
07-18-2024: - Base bullet damage reduced from 28 to 25
- Bullet damage growth increased from 1.84 to 2.1
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Essence Bomb|Size=20} Essence Bomb T2 reduced from +70 to +60
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Essence Bomb|Size=20} Essence Bomb T3 increased from 20% to 22%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Life Drain|Size=20} Life Drain self slow reduced from -40% to -25%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Exchange|Size=20} Soul Exchange can be cast on enemies that are lower health. It will always steal a minimum of 30% of their current health.
06-27-2024: - Updated {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lady Geist|Size=20} Lady Geist weapon sounds
06-20-2024: - Fixed the unit target UI not showing up for instant-cast abilities (MoKrill ult, {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lady Geist|Size=20} Lady Geist ult, Bebop bomb)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Essence Bomb|Size=20} Essence Bomb no longer starts decaying the arm time while in the air
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Essence Bomb|Size=20} Essence Bomb arm time reduced from 1s to 0.5s (this is a nerf for long distance bombs)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Exchange|Size=20} Soul Exchange T3 changed to "After swap gain +40% Fire Rate and +40% Spirit Resistance for 8s"
05-30-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Exchange|Size=20} Soul Exchange cast time reduced from 0.5 to 0.2
05-23-2024: - Improved visibility of {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lady Geist|Size=20} Lady Geist’s bullet and travel path
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Exchange|Size=20} Soul Exchange cast time reduced from 0.65s to 0.5s
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Malice|Size=20} Malice clipping aggressively against map geometry edges
05-16-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Exchange|Size=20} Soul Exchange now uses a new instant cast mechanism. When you are in range there is a valid target indicator.
05-10-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Malice|Size=20} Malice now comes out quicker and no longer slows you
05-03-2024: - Blood Bomb damage increased from 80 to 100
- Blood Bomb T2 damage increased from +65 to +70
- Blood Bomb tooltip fixed to reference the correct self damage type and that it can be reduced with armor
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Malice|Size=20} Malice damage amp per shard increased from 10% to 15%
